description: When you stay at Hallmark Hotel Birmingham Strathallan, you'll be just a 5-minute drive from International Convention Centre and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. The restaurant is the perfect spot for a bite to eat, and after visiting the fitness center for a workout, you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer 24-hour room service, LCD TVs, and free WiFi.

DESCRIPTION.value: When you stay at Hallmark Hotel Birmingham Strathallan, you'll be just a 5-minute drive from International Convention Centre and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. The restaurant is the perfect spot for a bite to eat, and after visiting the fitness center for a workout, you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer 24-hour room service, LCD TVs, and free WiFi.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. This 4-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms.

Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. 7 meeting rooms are available. This eco-friendly hotel also offers a fitness center, laundry facilities, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Onsite self parking is complimentary.

DINING.value:
Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available for a surcharge.
Brasserie restaurant - Onsite restaurant.
24-hour room service is available.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Birmingham Botanical Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Edgbaston Reservoir - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Brindleyplace - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
National Sea Life Centre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Ikon Gallery - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Barclaycard Arena - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
CBSO Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Symphony Hall - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
International Convention Centre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
St Thomas' Church - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Library of Birmingham - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Winterbourne Botanic Garden - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
The Mailbox - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Centenary Square - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
University of Birmingham - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The closest major airports to Hallmark Hotel Birmingham Strathallan are:
Birmingham (BHX) - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi
Coventry (CVT) - 32.6 km / 20.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hallmark Hotel Birmingham Strathallan is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in Birmingham, this eco-friendly hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Edgbaston Reservoir and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. International Convention Centre and Barclaycard Arena are also within 2 mi (3 km).

AWARDS_AND_AFFILIATIONS.value:
Green / Sustainable Property
This property participates in Green Tourism Program, a program that measures the property's impact on one or more of the following: environment, community, cultural-heritage, the local economy.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • Guests can arrange to bring pets by contacting the property directly, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for cooked-to-order breakfast: GBP 10.00 per person (approximately)
  • A pet fee will be charged
  • Crib (infant bed) fee: GBP 15.00 per stay
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 15.00 per stay

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with restaurant, near Birmingham Botanical Gardens

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: Pet-friendly rooms can be requested by contacting the property at the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for GBP 15.00 per stay

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Cooked-to-order breakfast is offered for an extra charge of GBP 10.00 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_KIDS.value: Cribs/Infant beds are available for GBP 15.00 per stay

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_PETS.value: Pets are allowed for an extra charge

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 135 guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Breakfast available
  • Fitness center
  • Business center
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Laundry service
  • Meeting rooms
  • Luggage storage

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When you stay at Hallmark Hotel Birmingham Strathallan, you'll be just a 5-minute drive from International Convention Centre and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. The restaurant is the perfect spot for a bite to eat, and after visiting the fitness center for a workout, you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer 24-hour room service, LCD TVs, and free WiFi.

POLICIES.value: Please note the hotel reserves the right to charge the credit card on file at the time the cancellation policy applies for any bookings where payment for the stay will be made on site instead of at the time of booking. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
